TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RuleConditionDialog extends System.Windows.Forms.Form

Docs.summary: This dialog is normally used by the activities , , , and to edit declarative conditions. However, if you want to use conditions outside of these activities (for example, edit a condition for use outside of a workflow completely), you can use this dialog to perform the editing of the condition.

Docs.param: The type of the object that this condition is executed against. Normally it is the workflow, but can be any valid type.

An optional implementation that is used to determine what types are available in the condition. If one is not specified, only types in the assembly specified by and any assemblies it references is available.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified activity type, the type provider, and the expression.
